text: ve aapase prashn karate hain ki unake lie kya halaal (vaidh) kiya gaya? aap kah den ki sabhee svachchh pavitr cheejen tumhaare lie halaal kar dee gayee hain. aur un shikaaree jaanavaron ka shikaar jinhen tumane us gyaan dvaara jo allaah ne tumhen diya hai, usamen se kuchh sikhaakar sadhaaya ho. to jo (shikaar) vah tumapar rok den usamen se khao aur usapar allaah ka naam[1] lo tatha allaah se darate raho. nihsandeh, allaah sheeghr haisaab lene vaala hai
